meanings.sent1: The movie was so mundanes that I fell asleep halfway through.
meanings.sent2: The gray, mundanes sky matched the boring mood of the day.
meanings.sent3: The mundanes lecture on paint drying techniques was a real snooze-fest.
meanings.sent4: Her mundanes personality was like watching paint dry.
meanings.sent5: The mundanes task of counting grains of sand seemed never-ending.

meanings.definition: A person who is not a wizard or involved in the supernatural.
meanings.sent1: In the magical world, mundanes are often unaware of the hidden wonders around them.
meanings.sent2: The wizarding school had a separate class for mundanes to learn basic spells.
meanings.sent3: The mundanes were amazed when they accidentally stumbled upon a magical portal.
meanings.sent4: To the wizards, the mundanes seemed like creatures from a different world.
meanings.sent5: The mundanes were oblivious to the magical creatures living in their midst.
